definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: scorpion (appar. quadrilit.; NH id.; As. aḳrabu; Eth. 9aqorab:; Ar. 9aqrabun; Targum [[עַקְרַבָּא]]);—abs. [[עַקְרָב]] De 8:15 (coll.; of wilderness), pl. [[עַקְרַבִּים]] Ez Eze 2:6 (fig. of enemies); ´[[יִסַּר בָּע]] 1Ki 12:11, 1Ki 12:14 = 2Ch 10:11, 2Ch 10:14, i.e. scourges with points, stings.—Vid. also [[מַעֲלֵה עַקְרַבִּים]]. p. 751
